question.content: Conversation in the other channel gave me a thought. As a gaming dad with an 8 year old that wants to play things like this, I've had to explore how to disable chat and enforce stricter moderation than when I'm playing. Of course, you can always disable chat, etc. but I'd love to see a parental control toggle feature that locks down aspects of a game with one click to save me the headache of turning it all on/off depending on if I'm at the keyboard or she is.

answer.content: Really can't promise anything in the short term because it's a lot of work to build out complex controls, but we are aiming to be able to have a flexible system that can allow players to account for different social situations.
